message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm giving you 10% of the money, which is more than you'd get in the next round.
Considering the inflation, I think this is a more reasonable split.
This is my final offer, Bob.  We can keep going, but the money will keep shrinking for me.  This is the best deal you'll get.
You said the last offer was your final one, but I'm willing to take the risk. This is my new proposal.
